events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision on the highway around 7 AM.
The claim was categorised under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the initial details of the vehicle involved.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the customer's auto accident claim and provide assistance.
The customer was formally acknowledged via email and informed about the next steps in the vehicle claim process.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical reports related to the car accident as part of the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos of the damaged car and the official police report.
The claims team started the investigation to verify liability and assess the extent of vehicle damages from the accident.
Investigation completed confirming the other driver was at fault, and damage assessment report was finalized.
A settlement covering vehicle repairs and medical expenses was proposed to the customer based on investigation findings.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and proposed settlement terms for the vehicle claim.
The claim was officially approved by the insurer, confirming the coverage for repairs and related expenses.
Payment for the settlement was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover repair costs and medical bills.
The auto accident claim was closed after confirmation that the customer had received payment and all conditions met.
The case files and all documentation related to the car accident claim were archived for future reference.
